name: imagecropper
description: The ImageCropper widget is a UI component that allows the user to select a portion of an image
author: juandopazo

examples.name: imagecropper-basic
examples.displayName: Augmenting an image with an ImageCropper
examples.description: This example shows how to create an ImageCropper from markup

examples.name: imagecropper-events
examples.description: This example shows how to use ImageCropper events to show a preview of the image being cropped

examples.name: imagecropper-gallery
examples.description: This example shows how to select the image to crop from a list of thumbnails

examples.name: imagecropper-autosize
examples.description: This example shows how to develop a Plugin for ImageCropper that resizes the widget automatically based on the size of its image
